de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.srlannotation

Class SRLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.srlannotation.SRLHelper

  • public class SRLHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Annotation helper. Map from Strings (single tokens or multiword tokens to words). For multiword predicates and arguments, find the head.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SRLHelper()

      Map given String of argument to word.

      Map given String/Tokenindex of predicate to word.

    • Method Detail

      • identifyPredicate

        public static de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.Word identifyPredicate(de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.SRLSentence sentence,
                                                                      java.lang.String predicate)
                                                               throws PredicateNotFoundException
        Map given String of predicate to word. Does not change the tree.
        Parameters:
        sentence - Sentence that is supposed to contain the String.
        predicate - String to be found.
        Returns:
        Word where the form is equivalent to the String to be found, in case of multiword predicate, one word is selected as the head.
        Throws:
        PredicateNotFoundException - if the String is empty or cannot be mapped to a word in the sentence.

      • identifyPredicate

        public static de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.Word identifyPredicate(de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.SRLSentence sentence,
                                                                      ComparisonAnnotationToken[] predicate)
                                                               throws PredicateNotFoundException
        Map given String/Tokenindex of predicate to word. Does not change the tree.
        Parameters:
        sentence - Sentence that is supposed to contain the String.
        predicate - String/Tokenindex to be found.
        Returns:
        Word at the token index indicated, in case of multiword predicate, one word is selected as the head.
        Throws:
        PredicateNotFoundException - if the String is empty or cannot be mapped to a word in the sentence, or at the index the word found is different from the expected token.

      • identifyArgument

        public static de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.Word identifyArgument(de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.SRLSentence sentence,
                                                                     java.lang.String argument)
                                                              throws ArgumentNotFoundException
        Map given String of argument to word. Does not change the tree.
        Parameters:
        sentence - Sentence that is supposed to contain the String.
        argument - String to be found.
        Returns:
        Word where the form is equivalent to the String to be found, in case of multiword argument, the lowest common ancestor is selected as the head.
        Throws:
        ArgumentNotFoundException - If the String is empty or cannot be mapped to a word in the sentence.

      • identifyArgument

        public static de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.Word identifyArgument(de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.SRLSentence sentence,
                                                                     ComparisonAnnotationToken[] argument)
                                                              throws ArgumentNotFoundException
        Map given String of argument to word. Does not change the tree.
        Parameters:
        sentence - Sentence that is supposed to contain the String.
        argument - String to be found.
        Returns:
        Word where the form is equivalent to the String to be found, in case of multiword argument, the lowest common ancestor is selected as the head.
        Throws:
        ArgumentNotFoundException - If the String is empty or cannot be mapped to a word in the sentence.
